title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Kamala Harris declares Mission Accomplished at the border. Rep. Lauren Boebert brings cardboard cutout of Kamala to the border. Infrastructure negotiations fall apart, Biden screwed them up by walking out on GOP Senator Shelley Moore Capito. Rush on the makeover of Kamala Harris after she was named Biden's running mate. Callers fed up with the Democrats. Rush on the flag.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Mara Gay of the New York Times is disturbed by the American flag. Rush on the meaning of the flag and why it triggers leftists. Ilhan Omar. Emotional Mexican-American caller defends the American flag, blasts Biden for disaster at border. World Health Organization recently welcomed Syria and Belarus. Rush on the WHO. Capitol Hill tech vendor hit by ransomware attack. Imposter gets into Kamala Harris presser.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Jane Fonda still getting arrested at protests. Rush on Jane Fonda. Podcast Episode 5 of Rush Limbaugh: The Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone, hosted by James Golden, aka Bo Snerdley, features Sean Hannity talking about Rush. EIB High Note: Mom returns after deployment overseas, surprises family. Caller on the first time he heard Rush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
